channel.title: Deep Learning on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on Portfolio

item.title: Project 1: Poison Ivy Detector
item.description: Summary • Assembled dataset of around 10,000 images via web-scraping & API calls with metadata managed in Postgres database across steps • Filtered out bad images by devising and applying custom filter functions that capture undesired traits • Tuned a MobileNetV3 model to classify images using transfer learning & fine-tuning in Tensorflow • Exported model with TF Lite and adapted into a simple Android app to detect poison ivy in camera feed.
